snippet: Martin Scorsese’s movie based on the debauched tale of Jordan Belfort’s first memoir has garnered five Academy Award nominations, including for best picture.
abstract: Martin Scorsese’s movie based on the debauched tale of Jordan Belfort’s first memoir has garnered five Academy Award nominations, including for best picture.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: 'The Wolf of Wall Street,' in the Hunt for Oscars
